name: Seven Kingdoms - Order of the White Sun (Slow Jams Prototype)
name_original: Seven Kingdoms - Order of the White Sun (Slow Jams Prototype)
description:
The shadows of conquest loom over the Seven Kingdoms, and only the United Nations of North Admeria are left standing against the mysterious Order of the White Sun!

Command your many units to victory, and liberate the nearby countries to stand a chance against this new oppressor!

Theme

The theme of the jam is explored through the use of "Unleashes", abilities that give Commanders in the game the ability to change the trail of battle after taking a certain set of damage, the ability is in this prototype, although a bit less well made. There is also a cliffhanger after the third man.

Information

This was made under a week for the Summer Slow Jams, I've had a very eventful month, and I couldn't give this full attention. It is "functional" in the sense the main features of a JRPG are here, but it lacks way too many features I've had in mind at first. You can enjoy these barebones by downloading the file on this page. This page will not be updated even if I think about continuing the project. I'll make a new one for the subsequent and this time feature-full versions of the game.

Controls

Unless stated otherwise, the controls are:

Left Click to interact with elements such as units or the Command Center

Right Click to go back from any menu

S to bring out the other commander's stats.

Credits

  • Othmane "Singleton" Filali Benaceur - Programming, UI, Game Design
  • Hot Shack - Art
  • Aniss "Schyzox" Aoudjehane - Music (Theme of Ali)
  • Louai "thesadclown" Elachkar - Music (Theme of Saif, Theme of Unleash)
  • TheUnlucky69 - Music (Victory)
